title: MT5: Withdrawal (request)
description: This call allows withdrawal from MT5 account to Binary account.

amount.description: Amount to withdraw (in the currency of the MT5 account); min = $1 or an equivalent amount, max = $20000 or an equivalent amount.

from_mt5.description: MT5 account login to withdraw money from

to_binary.description: Binary account loginid to transfer money to

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
